Class SessionMonitor<T extends Session>

    public class SessionMonitor<T extends Session>
extends Object
    A session monitor for validating sessions.

      protected static class  SessionMonitor.MonitorState

      • monitorActivityLifecycle

        public void monitorActivityLifecycle(ActivityLifecycleManager activityLifecycleManager)
        This is how we hook into the activity lifecycle to detect if the user is using the app.
        Parameters:
        activityLifecycleManager -

      • triggerVerificationIfNecessary

        public void triggerVerificationIfNecessary()
        triggerVerificationIfNecessary checks if there are any sessions to verify and if enough time has passed in order to run another verification. If it determines it can verify, it submits a runnable that does the verification in a background thread.

      • verifyAll

        protected void verifyAll()
